__SqlaTable__.sql:
SELECT 
  -- fact_voos.numero_etapa,
  dim_companhias.nome as Companhia,
  fact_voos.descricao_modelo as Aeronave,
  fact_voos.descricao_natureza_tipo_linha as Tipo_linha,
  fact_voos.numero_assentos_ofertados as Assentos_ofertados,
  dim_datas_arrive.data as Decolagem,
  dim_aerodromos_arrive.nome_municipio as Cidade_origem,
  dim_aerodromos_arrive.nome_pais as Pais_origem,
  dim_aerodromos_arrive.latitude as Latitude_origem,
  dim_aerodromos_arrive.longitude as Longitude_origem,
  dim_aerodromos_arrive.alpha2code as Alpha2Code_origem,
  dim_datas_take_off.data as Pouso,
  dim_aerodromos_take_off.nome_municipio as Cidade_destino,
  dim_aerodromos_take_off.nome_pais as Pais_destino,
  dim_aerodromos_take_off.latitude as Latitude_destino,
  dim_aerodromos_take_off.longitude as Longitude_destino,
  dim_aerodromos_take_off.alpha2code as Alpha2Code_destino,
FROM `anac_views.fact_voos` as fact_voos
JOIN `anac_views.dim_datas` as dim_datas_arrive
  ON fact_voos.id_arrive_date = dim_datas_arrive.id
JOIN `anac_views.dim_datas` as dim_datas_take_off
  ON fact_voos.id_take_off_date = dim_datas_take_off.id
JOIN `anac_views.dim_companhias` as dim_companhias
  ON fact_voos.id_firm = dim_companhias.id
JOIN `anac_views.dim_aerodromos` as dim_aerodromos_arrive
  ON fact_voos.id_arrive_airfield = dim_aerodromos_arrive.id
JOIN `anac_views.dim_aerodromos` as dim_aerodromos_take_off
  ON fact_voos.id_take_off_airfield = dim_aerodromos_take_off.id
